manzils.text: Qaf. By the glorious Quran
They are surprised that a warner came to them from them, so the disbelievers said: this is a strange thing
When we die and become dust (will we be raised)? This is an unlikely return
We definitely know what the earth reduces from them, and a book that keeps (track of everything) is with Us
No, but they denied the truth when it came to them, and they are in a state of confusion
Did they not look at the sky above them, that how We built it and beautified it, and it has no cracks
And We spread out the earth, and We placed firm mountains in it, and We grew all types of beautiful (plants) in it
An observation and a reminder for every repenting servant
And We sent down blessed rain from the sky, and with it We grew gardens and seed of the harvest
and tall palm trees having layered cluster (of dates)
as a provision for Our servants, and We gave life to a dead land with it. The coming out (of graves) is like that
People of Noah and inhabitants of Raas (the well) and Thamud denied before them
and Aad and Pharaoh and brothers of Lot
and inhabitants of the wood and people of Tubba (a Yemenite dynasty), all of them denied the messengers, so My threat (of punishment) was necessary
Were We tired by the first creation? No, but they are in doubt about the new creation
And We have certainly created the human being and We know what his soul seduces him to it, and We are closer to him than the jugular vein
when the two receivers (or recorders) sitting on the right and on the left receive (and record his works)
He does not speak a word unless there is an observer with him ready (to record)
And the agony of death comes in truth, which is what you were keeping away from it
And the trumpet is blown. That is the day of the threat
And every one comes with a driver (who steers him) and a witness
You were negligent of this, so We removed your cover from you, and today your eyesight is sharp
And his companion (angel) says: this is what is ready with me (record of his deeds)
Throw into hell every stubborn disbelievers
who prevented from the good, exceeded the limits, and was a doubter
the one who set up another god with God, so throw him into the severe punishment
His companion (devil) says: our Master, I did not make him rebel, but he was lost far (from the right path)
He (God) says: do not dispute before Me while I have sent the threat to you in advance
The word (of punishment) will not be changed with Me, and I am not a wrongdoer to My servants
On a day that We say to hell: are you filled? And it says: are there some more
And the garden is brought near for those who control themselves, and it is not far
This is what was promised to all who turn (to God) keeping (His commands)
anyone who fears the beneficent in the secret and comes with a repenting heart
(We tell him) enter it with peace (and well-being), this is the eternal day
They have whatever they want in it, and there is more with Us
And how many of generation did We destroy before them who were more courageous (and powerful) than them, and they explored throughout the land? Is there any way (or place) of escape
There is certainly a reminder in that for anyone who has a heart or listens while he is present (and attentive)
And We have certainly created the skies and the earth and whatever is between them in six stages and no fatigue touched us
So persevere (and be patient) about what they say and glorify your Master with praise before the sunrise and before the sunset
And glorify Him part of the night and after showing humbleness
And listen, on a day when the caller calls out from a nearby place
a day when they hear the awesome roar in truth. That is the day of coming out (of graves)
Indeed We give life and We cause death, and the final return is to Us
A day that the earth breaks open from them (and they come out of it) quickly. This is a gathering that is easy for Us
We know better about what they say. You are not to force them. So remind anyone who fears My threat by the Quran
By the scattering (winds) that scatters
and by the carriers of a heavy load (of rain)
and by the (ships) sailing with ease
and by the distributor of affair (the angels)
what you are promised is certainly true
and the judgment is certainly a reality
And by the sky having pathways (and orbits)
indeed you are of different opinion
Anyone who is deviated, he is deviated from it (Quran and the truth)
Death to the liars (and conjecturers)
Those who are neglectful in a flood (of ignorance)
They ask: when is the judgment day
A day that they are tortured over the fire
Taste (the result of) your trial, this is what you used to want it in a hurry
Indeed those who control themselves are in gardens and springs
Taking what their Master gave them. Indeed they were good doers before this
They used to sleep a little of the night
and they ask forgiveness by the dawns
and there was a (portion) in their wealth due for the beggars and the disadvantaged
And there are signs for those who are certain on the earth
and in yourselves. Do you not see
And your provision and what you are promised is in the sky
By the Master of the skies and the earth, it is certainly true, same as (it is true that) you speak
Did the story of the noble guests of Abraham reach you
When they entered upon him and they said: peace (and well-being). He said: peace (and well-being) strangers
Then he went to his family and brought a fat (roasted) calf
Then he placed it close to them saying: do you not eat
Then he felt afraid of them, they said: do not be afraid. And they gave him good news of a knowledgeable son
Then his wife came forward screaming, striking her face, and she said: I am an infertile old woman
They said: that is what your Master said, indeed He is the wise, the knowledgeable
He said: you messengers, so what is your business
They said: we were sent to a group of guilty ones
so that we send upon them stones of clay
marked by your Master for the excessive ones
So We brought out anyone who was among the believers in it
But We only found a house of the submitted ones in it
And We left a sign in it for those who fear the painful punishment
And in (the story of) Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authorization
Then he turned away with his base (of supporters) and said: a magician or a madman
So We took him and his troops, then We threw them in the sea, and he was to blame
And in (the story of) Aad when We sent upon them the destructive wind
It did not leave anything that it came upon it, except making it as the decomposed thing
And (the story of) Thamud when they were told: enjoy yourselves for a while
Then they rebelled against their Master’s command, so the thunderbolt took them while they were looking
Then they could not stand up and they could not take revenge (or defend)
And people of Noah in the past, indeed they were disobedient people
We built the sky with Our power and We are certainly expanding (it)
And We spread out the earth, and how good We spread out
And We created pairs of everything, so you may take notice
So run away to God. Indeed I am a clear warner for you from Him
And do not set up another god with God. Indeed I am a clear warner for you from Him
Likewise, no messenger came to those before them unless they said: a magician or a madman
Did they recommend (one another) to it? No, they are rebellious people
So turn away from them, you are not to blame
And (continue to) remind, as indeed the reminder benefits the believers
And I did not create Jinn and humans except to serve Me (and no one else)
I do not want any provision from them and I do not want them to feed Me
Indeed God is the provider having the power and the definitive strength
So indeed there are shares (of punishment) for those who did wrong same as shares of their companions, so they should not ask Me to rush
So woe to those who disbelieved from their day that they are promised
By the mountain (Mount Sinai)
and by a written book
in unrolled scroll
and by the thriving (and frequented) house
and by the raised roof
and by the blazing (and swollen) sea
your Master’s punishment is certainly a reality
No one (and nothing) can repel it
A day when the sky swings back and forth
and the mountains move about, traveling
woe to the deniers on that day
those playing around in useless talk
A day when they are forcefully pushed into fire of hell
This is the fire that you were denying it
So is this a magic or you do not see
Enter (and burn in) it, it is the same to you whether you are patient or you are not patient, you are only penalized for what you used to do
Indeed those who control themselves are in gardens and in happiness
Enjoying because of what their Master gave them and that their Master protected them from punishment of the hellfire
Eat and drink joyfully because of what you were doing
Leaning on couches lined up in rows, and We marry them to appealing girls with beautiful eyes
And those who believed and their descendants who followed them in belief, We join their descendants with them and We do not reduce anything from their works. Every person is bound by what he did
And We help them with whatever fruit and meat they desire
They pass a cup to one another in there that there is nothing useless or sinful in it
And young male servants who are like hidden pearl go around them for (serving) them
And they turn to each other asking one another
they say: indeed we were afraid among our people in the past
but God favored upon us and protected us from the punishment of scorching wind
Indeed we used to call on Him in the past. Indeed He is the good, the merciful
So remind (them) that by your Master’s favor you are not a fortune-teller or a madman
Or do they say: a poet, we wait for his time of misfortune (his death)
Say: wait and I wait with you
Or does their imagination (and dreams) order them to this, or are they disobedient people
Or they say he made it up? No, but they do not believe
So let them bring a saying like it (Quran), if they are truthful
Or were they created from nothing, or are they the creators
Or did they create the skies and the earth? No, they are not certain
Or are the treasures of their Master with them, or are they in charge (of them)
Or do they have a ladder that they listen by it? Then their listeners should bring a clear reason
Or does He have the daughters and you have the sons
Or do you ask them for a wage, and they are weighed down by the debt
Or is the unseen with them, and they write it
Or do they want to plot? But those who disbelieved are plotted against
Or do they have a god other than God? God is flawless of what they associate (with Him)
And if they see a piece of the sky falling down, they say: piled up clouds
So leave them until they meet their day, in which they are thunderstruck (and die)
A day that their plot is of no use to them at all, and they are not helped
And indeed for those who did wrong there is a punishment other than this, but most of them do not know
And be patient for your Master’s command, as you are under Our eyes, and glorify your Master with praise when you get up
And glorify Him part of the night and when the stars disappear
By the star when it goes down
your companion is not misguided and he was not deceived
And he does not speak from the desire
It (Quran) is not but a revelation that is revealed
The very powerful (Gabriel) taught him
being strong, he stood firmly
And he was at the higher horizon
then he came closer and he came down
until he was at a distance of two bows or closer
then he revealed to His servant what he revealed
His (the prophet’s) heart did not deny what he saw
Do you argue with him about what he sees
And he has certainly seen him in another descent
By the Lote (Sidra) tree at the utmost boundary
Next to it is garden of the residence
When that which covers covered the Lote (Sidra) tree
The eye did not turn aside and did not outreach
He has certainly seen some of the great signs of His Master
What do you think of the Lat, the Uzza
and Manat, the third one (of them)
Are the males for you and the females for Him
That is an unfair division

They are only names which you and your fathers named it, whereas God did not send down any reason for it? They only follow the guess and what the souls desires, while the guidance has certainly come to them from their Master
Or does the human being have whatever he desire
While the last (the hereafter) and the first (this world) belongs to God
And many angels are in the skies, that their mediation is of no benefit at all except after God gives permission for whom He wants and He approves
Indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter shall name the angels the feminine names
while they have no knowledge of it, they only the follow guesswork, and guesswork is of no use against the truth at all
So stay away from anyone who turns away from Our reminder and only wants this world’s life
That is their extent of the knowledge. Indeed your Master knows better anyone who lost His way and He knows better anyone who is guided

And whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth belongs to God, so that He penalizes those who did bad in what they did and to reward those who did good with the better (reward than what they did)

those who avoid the big sins and the indecencies except the small ones. Your Master is vast in the forgiveness. He knows better about you, when He produced you from the earth and when you were hidden (as embryos) in your mothers’ wombs. So do not claim yourselves pure (and innocent), as He knows better who controls himself
Did you see the one who turned away
and gave a little and was stingy
Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees
Or was he not informed of what is in scriptures of Moses
and Abraham, the one who fulfilled (his duties)
That no bearer bears burden of another
and that there is not (any reward) for the human being except what he tried for
And that his efforts will be seen
then he is rewarded with the full reward
And that the final ending is to your Master
And that He is he who makes (everyone) laugh and cry
And He is he who causes death and gives life
And that He created the two types, the male and the female
from sperm when it is ejected
And that the other creation is His responsibility
And that He is he who makes rich and makes poor (or gives property)
And that He is he who is Master of the Sirius (the brightest star at night)
And that He destroyed the earlier Aad
and Thamud, and He did not leave (anyone alive)
And (He destroyed) people of Noah before (them), indeed they were more wrongdoer and more rebellious
And He overthrew the turned over cities
and it was covered by what covers
So which of your Master's favors do you doubt
This is a warner like the previous warners
The upcoming (judgment day) is coming up
No one other than God can expose it
Are you surprised by this saying
and you laugh and you do not cry
and you are negligent
So show humbleness to God and serve Him
The hour gets close and the moon splits
And if they see a miracle they turn away and say: a continuous magic
And they denied, and followed their desires. And all matters have a settlement
And the news (of the earlier ones) have certainly come to them, that in which there is a deterrence
a perfect wisdom, but warnings are of no use
So stay away from them, a day (comes when) the caller calls them to a nasty thing
With their eyes looking down (in humiliation), they come out of their graves as if they were spreading locusts
Rushing toward the caller, the disbelievers say: this is a difficult day
People of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant (Noah) and they said a madman, and he was outcast
So he called on his Master: I am defeated, so help
So We opened the gates of the sky with downpour of water
And We gushed out springs from the earth. The waters joined for a matter that was destined (the flood)
And We carried him on (the Ark) having timbers and nails
It sailed under Our eyes, a reward for him who was rejected (Noah)
And We have certainly left it as a sign, so does anyone take notice
So how were My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
Aad denied, so how were My punishment and My warnings
Indeed We sent a continuous ice cold wind upon them on a miserable day
knocking the people over as if they were uprooted trunks of a palm tree
So how were My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
Thamud denied the warnings
And they said: should we follow him, a single human being among us? Then indeed we are in error and madness
Is the reminder only given to him among us? No, he is a rude liar
Tomorrow they are going to know who the rude liar is
Indeed We are senders of the female camel as a test for them, so watch them and be patient
And inform them that the water is shared between them, and each drinking is to be attended
But they called their companion, and he took (a knife) and killed (her)
So how were My punishment and My warnings
Indeed We sent a single awesome roar upon them and they became like dried broken straws of a barn maker
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
People of Lot denied the warnings
Indeed We sent a sandstorm upon them, except Lot’s family whom We saved them by dawn
a favor from Us. That is how We reward anyone who thanks
And he has certainly warned them of Our assault, but they doubted the warnings
And they have certainly demanded his guest from him, so We blinded their eyes, so taste My punishment and My warnings
And certainly a lasting punishment took them by early morning
So taste My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
And the warners have certainly come to Pharaoh’s people
They denied all Our signs, so We took them (into punishment), a powerful and awesome taking
Are your disbelievers better than them, or is there immunity for you in the scriptures
Or do they say we are united and victorious
They are all going to be defeated and turn their backs (running away)
No, the hour is their appointment time, and the hour is more awful and bitterer (than this world’s punishment)
Indeed the guilty ones are in error and madness
A day when they are dragged into the fire on their faces (they are told): taste the touch of hell
Indeed We created everything in correct proportion
And Our command is only once, like a blink of an eye
And We have certainly destroyed your kinds, so does anyone take notice
And everything they did is in the books
And everything small or big is written
And indeed those who control themselves will be in gardens and rivers
In a seat of truth, with a mighty ruler
The beneficent
taught the Quran
created the human being
taught him the speech
The sun and the moon with precisely calculated (courses)
The herb (or the star) and the tree both humble themselves (before Him)
And He raised the sky and set up the balance
that you do not outdo the balance
And perform the weighing with justice and do not make the scale light
And He set up the earth for the human race
in it there are fruits and palm trees having coverings
and the seed having outer shell, and the fragrant herbs
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
He created the human being from dried clay like pottery clay
And He created the Jinn from flame of a fire
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Master of the two easts and Master of the two wests
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
He made the two seas flow freely to meet
there is a barrier between them that they do not go beyond
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Pearl and coral comes out of both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And the sailing ships raised in the sea like the mountains/road signs belong to Him
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Everyone on it (the earth) is mortal
while your Master's essence, having the majesty and the nobility remains (forever)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Everyone in the skies and on the earth ask Him (for their needs). Every day He is in some affair
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
We are going to attend to you, the two important beings (humans and Jinn)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
You, group of Jinn and humans, if you can cross the boundaries of the skies and the earth then cross. You cannot cross except with an authorization
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
A flame of fire and melted copper will be sent upon both of you, and you cannot help/defend yourselves
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And when the sky splits and it becomes red like the red rawhide (or red hot oil)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
On that day no human being or Jinn is asked about his sin
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
The guilty ones are recognized by their appearance, then they are taken by (the hair lock of) the forehead and the feet
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
This is hell that the guilty ones deny it
They go around between it and between hot boiling water
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And there are two gardens for anyone who fears his Master’s position
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Two (gardens) having a variety (of trees)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are two springs flowing in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are pairs of every fruits in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Leaning on cushions/beds inside of which is from heavy silk, and fruits of the two gardens are within reach
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And there are girls with restrained glances in them whom no human being or Jinn had sex with them before them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
They are like the ruby and the coral
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Is reward of the goodness anything except goodness
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And beside those two are two (other) gardens
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Both dark green (because of lush vegetation)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are two springs gushing out in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are fruits and date and pomegranate in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are good and beautiful females in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Appealing girls restricted in the pavilions
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
No human being or Jinn had sex with them before them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Leaning on green pillows and fine colorful carpets
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Blessed is the name of your Master, having the majesty and the nobility
When the event happens
and its happening is not false
it is lowering and elevating (humiliating and honoring)
When the earth is violently shaken
and the mountains are totally disintegrated
and become scattered dust
And you will be three types
The associates of happiness (the fortunate people). Who are the fortunate people
The associates of misery (the unfortunate people). Who are the unfortunate people
And the pioneers (in devotion) are the pioneers (in the hereafter)
They are the close ones (to God)
in gardens of delight
A large number of the earlier ones
and a few from the later ones
On sofas lavishly decorated (with jewels and gold)
reclining on them, facing each other
Immortal youths circulate among them
with drinking glasses and jugs and cups of spring water
They do not get headache and they do not get exhausted (and drunk) from it
And from whatever fruits they choose
and from whatever meat of birds they desire
and appealing girls with beautiful eyes
like the hidden pearl (inside the shell)
as a reward for what they used to do
They do not hear useless or sinful (talk) in it
except a saying of peace (and well-being), peace (and well-being)
And the associates of the right hand (the fortunate), who are the fortunate
Among thorn free Lote (Sidra) tree
and banana trees piled up (with fruits)
and extended shade
and flowing water
and plenty of fruits
not ending and not forbidden
And dignified spouses
whom We created them perfectly
and We made them virgins
devoted (and loving), of equal age
for associates of the right hand (the fortunate)
a large number of the earlier ones
and a large number of the later ones
And associates of the left hand (the unfortunate), who are the unfortunate
In scorching wind and boiling water
and shade of thick (black) smoke
not cool and not nice
Indeed they were rich (and wealthy) before this
and they insisted on the great sin
and they used to say: would we be raised when we die and become dust and bones
Or our forefathers
Say: indeed the earlier ones and the later ones
are certainly collected at an appointment of a known day
Then indeed you, the misguided deniers
are certainly eaters of Zaqqum tree
and filling the stomachs from it
then drinking boiling water over it
and drinking as thirsty camels drink
This is their entertainment on the judgment day
We created you, so why do you not acknowledge
What do you think of what you ejaculate
Do you create it or are We the creators
We mandated the death among you, and We will not be surpassed
in replacing (you with) the likes of you and producing you in (a form) that you do not know
You have certainly known about the first creation, so why do you not take notice
What do you think of what you plant
Do you grow it, or are We the growers
If We want, We make it into broken pieces, and leave you wondering
(saying): we certainly suffered losses
no, but we are deprived
What do you think of the water that you drink
Did you send it down from the cloud, or are We the senders
If We want, We make it bitter (and salty), so why are you not thankful
What do you think of the fire that you light
Did you make its tree, or are We the makers
We made it a reminder and a provision for those living/traveling in the desert
So glorify the name of your great Master
So I swear by positions of the stars
and it is a great oath if you knew
indeed this is a noble Quran
in a concealed book
none touch it except the purified ones
a sending down from the Master of Human kind
Do you take this saying lightly
and you make it your livelihood to deny it
So why not when it (life) reaches the throat
and you are watching at that moment
while We are closer to him than you but you do not see
then if you are not obligated, why don't
you return it (the soul to the body), if you are truthful
But if he is one of the close ones (to God)
then ease and comfort and gardens of delight (are for him)
And if he is among associates of the right hand (the fortunate)
then peace (and well-being) for you among associates of the right hand
And if he is among the misguided deniers
then entertainment of boiling water
and entering (and burning in) hellfire (is for him)
And this is indeed the sure truth
So glorify the name of your great Master
Everything in the skies and the earth glorifies God, and He is the powerful, the wise
Rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, He gives life and causes death, and He is capable of everything
He is the first and the last, and the obvious and the obscure, and He knows everything

He is the One who created the skies and the earth in six stages and then He settled on the throne. He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it, and whatever comes down from the sky and whatever that goes up to it, and He is with you wherever you are, and God sees whatever you do
Rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, and the affairs are returned to God
He makes the night pass through the day and makes the day pass through the night. And He knows what is inside the chests (your intentions)
Believe in God and His messenger and spend (in God's way) from what He made you successors in it. There is a great reward for those of you who believed and spent (in God's way)
What is with you that you don’t believe in God while the messenger calls you to believe in your Master? And He has certainly taken your commitment if you are believer
He is the One who sends down clear signs to His servant in order to bring you out of the darkness into the light. And God is indeed gentle and merciful to you

And what is with you that you do not spend in God’s way, while the inheritance of the skies and the earth belongs to God? Those of you who spent and fought before the victory are not equal (with those who did that later). They have greater rank than those who spent and fought afterward, while God promised the goodness to all (of them). And God is well informed of what you do
And who is he that lends God a good loan (or who is he that offers God a good deed) so that He multiplies it for him, and there is a noble (and generous) reward for him

A day when you see the believing men and the believing women rushing with their lights ahead of them and to the right of them (they will be told): today your good news is gardens that rivers flow through them, remaining in there forever. That is the great victory

A day when the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women say to those who believed: look at us that we may get some of your light. It is said: go back to your past and look for a light. And a wall having a gate is put up between them, its interior has mercy in it while its exterior has the punishment facing it

They (the disbelievers) call on them (the believers): were we not with you? they say: yes, but you tempted yourselves and you waited and you doubted, and wishful thinking deceived you until God’s command came and the deceiver (Satan) deceived you about God
So today no ransom is taken from you and from those who disbelieved, your housing is the fire, it is your sponsor and it is a bad destination

Is it not about time for those who believed to humble their hearts for God’s remembrance and what came down from the truth, and do not be like those who were given the book in the past, and then after some time passed for them their hearts hardened and many of them were disobedient
Know that God brings the earth back to life after its death. We certainly made the signs clear for you, so that you may understand
The charitable men and the charitable women and those who lend God a good loan (or offer God a good deed), it (their reward) is multiplied for them and a noble (and generous) reward is for them

And those who believed in God and His messenger, they are the truthful and witnesses before their Master, they have their reward and their light. And those who disbelieved and denied Our signs, they are inhabitants of the hellfire

Know that this world’s life is only play and amusement, and decoration and show off among yourselves, and wanting more in the wealth and the children. It is like the example of a rain that its plant growth impresses the farmers, then it dries up and you see it turn yellow and then becomes broken pieces. And in the hereafter there is severe punishment (for the disbelievers) and forgiveness and pleasure of God (for the believers). And this world’s life is only means of the deception

Race to forgiveness of your Master, and a garden whose width is as wide as the sky and the earth, and is prepared for those who believed in God and His messengers. That is God’s grace that He gives it to anyone He wants. And God has enormous grace
No tragedy happens on the earth or within yourselves unless it is in a book before We create it (according to God's laws). This is easy for God
So that you do not be sad over what slips away from you (or what you lose) and not to be overjoyed about what He gives you. And God does not like any selfish show off
those who are stingy and order people to the stinginess. And anyone who turns back, God is indeed the rich (without any need) and the praiseworthy

We have certainly sent Our messengers with clear proofs, and sent down the book and the balance (of right and wrong) with them so that people carry out justice. And We sent down the iron in which there is a great badness and benefits for the people, and for God to know anyone who helps Him and His messenger in the secret. God is indeed strong and powerful
And We have certainly sent Noah and Abraham and We put the prophethood and the book among their descendants, so some of them were guided, and most of them were disobedient

Then We followed them up with Our messengers, and We sent Jesus son of Mary and We gave him the Gospel, and put gentleness and mercy in the heart of those who followed him. But they made up being monks, We did not mandate it to them, but (We mandated) looking for God's pleasure, but they did not observe it as it was supposed to be observed. Then we gave those among them who believed their reward, while most of them are disobedient

You who believe, be cautious of God and believe in His messenger, that He gives you a double portion of His mercy and makes a light for you to walk with it and forgives you. He is forgiving and merciful
So that people of the book know that they do not have a bit of power over God’s grace, and that the grace is in God’s hand, giving it to anyone He wants. God has enormous grace
God has heard word of the one who argues with you about her husband and complains to God. God heard your conversation, indeed God hears all and sees all

Those of you who divorce their wives by declaring them as their mothers, they are not their mothers. No one is their mothers except those who gave them birth, and they certainly say a nasty word and a lie. And God certainly pardons and forgives

And those who divorce their wives by declaring them as their mother, then they go back on what they said, should free a slave before touching each other. This is what you are advised to it. And God is well informed of what you do

And if someone does not find (a slave) then fasting for two consecutive months before touching each other. And anyone who cannot (fast), then feeding sixty needy (ones). This is for you to believe in God and His messenger, and this is the limits set by God, and for the disbelievers there is a painful punishment
Indeed those who oppose God and His messenger are subdued as those before them were subdued. And We have sent down clear signs, and for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment
A day that God raises them all, then He informs them of what they did, as God counted it while they forgot it. And God witnesses everything

Did you not see that God knows whatever is in the skies and whatever is on the earth? There is not any whispering of three unless He is the fourth of them, and not of any five unless He is the sixth of them, and no less or no more than this unless He is with them, wherever they are. Then on the resurrection day He informs them of what they did. Indeed God knows everything

Did you not see those who were prohibited from whispering, then they returned to what they were prohibited from it, while whispering about sin and enmity and disobedience of the messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you in such a way that God has not greeted you with it, and they say among themselves: why does not God punish us for what we say? Hell is enough for them, they enter (and burn in) it, and it is a bad destination

You who believe, when you whisper to each other, do not whisper about sin and enmity and disobedience of the messenger, but whisper about goodness and self control, and be cautious of God, the One you are gathered to Him
The whisper is only from Satan to make those who believed sad, while it does not harm them a bit unless with God's permission. And the believers should put their trust in God

You who believe, when you are told to make room in the assemblies, then make room so that God makes room for you, and when it is said to get up, then get up. God raises ranks of those among you who believed and those who were given the knowledge. And God is well informed of what you do

You who believe, when you whisper to the messenger, then give to charity before your whispering. This is better and purer for you. And if you did not find (it affordable), then indeed God is forgiving and merciful

Were you afraid of giving to charity before your whispering? So when you did not do it and God turned to you (and forgave you), then perform the mandatory prayer and give to the mandatory charity and obey God and His messenger. God is well informed of what you do
Did you not see those who turn (in friendship) to people whom God's anger is upon them? They are not from you and (you are) not from them, and they swear falsely while they know
God prepared a severe punishment for them, for what they were doing is indeed bad
They took their oath as a shield to obstruct (people) from God's way, so they have a humiliating punishment
Their possessions and children are of no use against God at all. They are inhabitants of the fire, remaining in there forever
On a day that God raises them all, then they swear for Him as they swear for you, and they think that they are on to something. Know that indeed they are liars
Satan overcame them and made them forget God's remembrance, they are Satan's party. Know that indeed Satan's party, they are the losers
Indeed those who oppose God and His messenger, they are among the lowest ones
God prescribed: I and My messengers shall be victorious. God is indeed strong and powerful

You do not find any group who believe in God and the last day that they love those who oppose God and His messenger, even if they are their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their family (and tribe members). He wrote the belief in their hearts and He assisted them with a spirit from Him, and He admits them to gardens which rivers flow through them, remaining in there forever. God is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him, they are God's party. Know that God's party, they are indeed the successful ones
Whatever is in the skies and whatever is on the earth glorify God, and He is the powerful, the wise

He is the One who drove out those who disbelieved among the people of the book from their homes for the first forced emigration. You did not think that they would leave. And they thought that their fortresses would protect them against God, but God came to them from where they did not expect, and He threw horror in their hearts. They destroyed their homes with their own hands and the believers' hands. So you who have insight, learn a lesson
And if God had not prescribed the evacuation for them, He would have certainly punished them in this world, and they have punishment of the fire in the hereafter
That is because they opposed God and His messenger, and whoever opposes God, then God is indeed severe in the punishment
Any palm tree that you cut down or you left it standing on its roots, it is by God's permission so that He humiliates the disobedient

And whatever God gave to His messenger as spoil from them, you did not bother (riding) any horse or camel for it, but God makes His messengers dominate over whomever He wants. And God is capable of everything

And whatever God gave to His messenger as spoil from people of the towns is for God and for the messenger and for the relatives (and close ones) and the orphans and the needy and the traveler (in need) so that it does not circulate between the rich among you. And whatever the messenger gave you then take it, and whatever he held you back from it then stay away from it, and be cautious of God. God is indeed severe in the punishment

And (part of it is) for the poor immigrants, those who were driven out of their homes and their possessions and they look for God’s bounty and His pleasure and they help God and His messenger. They are the truthful ones

And (part of it is for) those who settled down in the houses (in Medina) and in the faith before them, and they like anyone who emigrated to them, and they do not find any need in their minds for what they were given, and they prefer them over themselves even though poverty is among them. And anyone who restrains his own stinginess (and greed), then they are the successful ones

And those who came after them say: our Master, forgive us and our brothers who came to faith before us, and do not put any resentment in our hearts toward those who believed, Our Master, you are gentle and merciful

Did you not see those hypocrites who say to their brothers who disbelieved among people of the book: if you are driven out we shall leave with you, and we would never obey anyone about you, and we shall help you if you are fought. God testifies that they are certainly liars

If they are driven out they would not leave with them, and if they are fought they will not help them, and if they (want to) help them, they shall turn their backs (and run away), then they are not helped
You are certainly more frightening than God in their minds. That is because they are a group who do not understand

They do not fight you altogether unless in well protected towns or from behind walls. Their hostility among them is severe. You think they are all together (and united) while their hearts are divided. That is because they are a group who do not understand
Same as those before them in the near past, they tasted the bad result of their affair, and they have a painful punishment
Same as Satan when he says to the human being: disbelieve. Then when he disbelieves, he (Satan) says: I am free of you (and have nothing to do with you), I fear God, Master of humankind
The end of both of them is in the fire, remaining in there forever, and that is the penalty of the wrongdoers
You who believe, be cautious of God, and everyone should watch what he sends ahead for tomorrow, and be cautious of God. God is well informed of what you do
And do not be like those who forgot God, so He made them forget themselves. They are the disobedient ones
Inhabitants of the fire and inhabitants of the garden are not equal. Inhabitants of the garden, they are the winners

If We had sent down this Quran to a mountain, you would have certainly seen it humbly breaking up from fear of God. And that is among the examples that We give it for the people, so that they may think
He is God, the One that there is no god except Him, knower of the unseen and the visible, He is the beneficent, the merciful

He is God, the One that there is no god except Him, the ruler, the holy, the (source of) peace, the (source of) security, the guardian, the powerful, the enforcer, the supreme. God is flawless of what they associate (with Him)
He is God, the creator, the inventor, the designer. All the good names (and attributes) belong to Him. Whatever is in the skies and on the earth glorify Him, and He is the powerful, the wise

You who believe, do not take My enemy and your enemy as your friends, offering them friendship. They have disbelieved in what came to you in truth, driving the messenger and yourselves out because you believe in God your Master. If you go out to try hard in My way and look for My pleasure, why do you secretly offer them the friendship, while I know what you hide and what you disclose. And whoever among you does it, he has lost the even way
If they overcome you, they become your enemies and they extend their hands and their tongues towards you with bad (intentions), and they wish that you disbelieve
Your blood relatives (and close relatives) and your children will never benefit you on the resurrection day as He separates you, and God sees whatever you do

There has been a good example for you in Abraham and those with him when they said to their people: we are free of (and have nothing to do with) you and whatever you serve other than God, we disbelieve in you, and an unending enmity and hatred started between us and you until you believe in God alone. Except Abraham's word to his father: I shall ask forgiveness for you, although I don’t have power of anything for you from God. Our Master, we trust in You and we turn to You (in repentance) and the final return is to You
Our Master, do not make us a test for those who disbelieved, and our Master forgive us, indeed You are the powerful, the wise

Certainly there has been a good example in them for you, for anyone who hopes for God and the last day. And anyone who turns away, then (know that) God is the rich (and without needs), the praiseworthy
Perhaps God makes a friendship between you and those of them whom you were enemies, God is capable and God is forgiving and merciful
God does not prohibit you from being kind and fair toward those who did not fight you about the religion and did not drive you out of your homes. Indeed God likes those who are just

God only prohibits you from making friends with those who fought you about the religion and drove you out of your homes and supported (others) in driving you out. And anyone who makes friend with them, then they are the wrongdoers

You who believe, when the believing women come to you as emigrants, then examine them, even though God knows their belief better. So if you find them as believing women, then do not return them to the disbelievers, they are not lawful for them (the disbelievers) and they (the disbelievers) are not lawful for them, and give them (the disbelievers) what they spent (for these women). And there is no blame on you if you marry them when you give them their compensations (marriage portions). And do not hold on to the (marriage) ties of disbelieving women, and ask for what you spent and they should ask for what they spent. This is God's command, He judges between you. God is knowledgeable and wise

And if any of your wives goes away to the disbelievers (and they didn't pay you for what you spent), so when your turn comes, then give those (men) whose wives went away equal to what they spent. And be cautious of God, the One whom you believe in Him

Prophet, when the believing women come to you pledging to you that they will not associate anything with God, and they will not steal, and they will not commit adultery (and fornication), and they will not kill their children, and they will not bring false accusation that they made up between their hands and their feet (by falsely claiming that their husband or someone else is the father of their child), and they will not disobey you in what is right, then accept their pledge and ask God for their forgiveness. God is indeed forgiving and merciful
You who believe, do not make friends with people whom God’s anger is upon them, for they have lost hope of the hereafter as the disbelievers lost hope of (return of) inhabitants of the graves
Whatever is in the skies and whatever is on the earth glorify God, and He is the powerful, the wise
You who believe, why do you say what you do not do
It is most hateful before God that you say what you do not do
God likes those who fight in His way in rows as if they were a solid structure

And when Moses said to his people: my people, why do you harass me while you have known that I am God's messenger to you? So when they deviated, God made their hearts deviate. And God does not guide the disobedient people

And when Jesus son of Mary said: children of Israel, indeed I am God's Messenger to you confirming what is before me in the Torah, and giving good news of a messenger coming after me, whose name (or whose attribute) is Ahmad (or praised one). Then when he brought them the clear proofs, they said: this is an obvious magic
Who is more wrong than someone who makes up lie (and attribute it) to God while he is called to the submission? God does not guide the wrongdoing people
They want to put out God's light with (words of) their mouths, while God completes His light even though the disbelievers dislike it

He is the One who sent His messenger with the guidance and the right way of life in order to inform him about all of the religion (God's recommended way of life), even though the polytheists dislike it
You who believe, should I advise you of a deal that saves you from a painful punishment
Believe in God and His messenger, and try hard in God's way with your possessions and lives. That is better for you if you knew
He forgives your sins, and admits you into gardens which rivers flow through them and to good houses in eternal gardens. That is the great victory
And other (thing that) you love it, help from God and a forthcoming victory. And give good news to the believers

You who believe, be God's helpers, as Jesus son of Mary told his apostles: who are my helpers toward God? The apostles said: we are God's helper. So a group of children of Israel believed and a group disbelieved. Then We helped those who believed against their enemies, and they became victorious
Whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth glorify God, the ruler, the holy, the powerful, the wise

He is the One who raised among the illiterate a messenger from themselves to read to them His verses and to purify (and absolve) them and to teach them the book and the wisdom while they were indeed in obvious error in the past
And others among them who have not joined them yet. And He is the powerful, the wise
That is God's grace, He gives it to anyone He wants, and God has enormous grace

Example of those who were charged with the Torah and they did not carry it out is like the example of the donkey carrying books. The example of the people who denied God's signs is bad. And God does not guide the wrongdoing people
Say: you who are Jewish, if you claim that you are God's friend (and His chosen ones) and not other people, then wish for the death (to go to paradise sooner) if you are truthful
And they will never wish it because of what they sent ahead, and God knows the wrongdoers well
Say: indeed the death that you run away from it catches up with you then you are returned to knower of the unseen and the visible, then He informs you of what you were doing
You who believe, when you are called for the mandatory prayer of the Friday, then hurry up to God's remembrance, stopping the trade. That is better for you if only you knew
Then when the mandatory prayer is finished, disperse in the land and look for God's bounty, and remember God often, so that you may be successful
And when they see a business or an amusement, they go away to it and leave you standing. Say: what is with God is better than the amusement and the business, and God is the best of the providers
When the hypocrites come to you, they say: we testify that indeed you are God's messenger. While God knows that indeed you are His messenger, and God testifies that the hypocrites are certainly liars
They took their oath as a shield, then obstructed (people) from God's way. Indeed what they were doing is bad
That is because they believed, then disbelieved, so their hearts were sealed so that they do not understand

And when you see them, their bodies impress you, and if they speak you listen to their speech, as if they are lumbers leaned (against a wall), they think that every noise is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May God destroy them, how are they deviated
And when they are told: come, God's messenger asks forgiveness for you. They turn their heads and you see them turn away in arrogance
It is the same for them whether you ask forgiveness for them or you do not ask forgiveness for them. God will never forgive them. Indeed God does not guide the disobedient people
They are those who say: do not spend on those who are with God's messenger until they break up. The treasures of the skies and the earth belong to God, but the hypocrites do not understand
They say: if we return to Medina, the more powerful shall drive out the weaker from there. The power (and honor) belongs to God and His messenger and the believers, but the hypocrites do not know
You who believe, your possessions and your children should not distract you from God's remembrance. And anyone who does that, then they are the losers

And spend (in God's way) from what We provided you before death comes to one of you and he says: my Master, why did You not postpone me (my death) for a short period, so that I give to charity and be of the righteous
And God will never postpone (the death of) anyone when his time comes. God is well informed of what you do
Whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth glorify God. The rule belongs to Him, and all praise belongs to Him, and He is capable of everything
He is the One who created you, then some of you are disbelievers and some of you are believers. God sees whatever you do
He created the skies and the earth with the truth, and He shaped you, and shaped you well, and the final return is to Him
He knows whatever in the skies and on the earth, and He knows what you hide and what you disclose. God knows inside the chests
Did not news of those who disbelieved in the past come to you? They tasted the bad result of their affair, and they have a painful punishment

That is because their messenger brought them the clear proofs, then they said: does a human being guide us? So they disbelieved and turned away, while God does not need them, and God is rich (without needs) and praiseworthy
Those who disbelieved claimed that they will never be raised. Say: yes, by my Master, you shall be raised, then you shall be informed of what you did, and that is easy for God
So, believe in God and His messenger and the light which We sent down, and God is well informed of what you do

A day when He gathers you for the day of gathering, that is the day of mutual loss and gain. And anyone who believes in God and does good works, He removes his sins from him and admits him to gardens which rivers flow through them, remaining in there forever and ever. That is the great victory
And those who disbelieved and denied Our signs, they are inhabitants of the fire, remaining in there forever, and it is a bad destination
No tragedy happens except with God's permission (according to His laws). And anyone who believes in God, He guides his heart. And God knows everything
And obey God and obey the messenger, and if you turn away, then Our messenger's responsibility is only the clear preaching
God, there is no god except Him, so the believers should put their trust in God
You who believe, indeed some of your wives and your children are your enemies, so beware of them. And if you excuse and overlook and forgive, then indeed God is forgiving and merciful
Your possessions and your children are only a test, and the big reward is with God

So be cautious of God as much as you can and listen and obey and spend (in God's way), it is better for yourselves, and anyone who is protected from his own stinginess (and greed), then they are the successful ones
If you lend God a good loan (or offer God a good deed), He multiplies it for you and forgives you. God is appreciative and patient
Knower of the unseen and the visible, the powerful, the wise

Prophet, when you divorce the women, then divorce them after their waiting period (three monthly periods) and keep count of the waiting period and be cautious of God your Master. (During that period) do not drive them out of their houses and they should not leave unless they commit an obvious indecency. This is limits set by God. And anyone who exceeds limits set by God then he has wronged himself. You do not know, for God may bring about an affair after that (to cause reconciliation)

And when they reach their appointed time, then keep them nicely or part with them nicely, and take two just persons from among yourselves as witness, and perform the testimony for God. This is what anyone who believes in God and the last day is advised to it. And anyone who is cautious of God, He makes a way out for him
And He provides him from where he would not think. And whoever puts his trust in God then He is enough for him. Indeed God achieves His purpose. God has set a (proper) measure for everything

And if you have doubt about those women of yours who are hopeless of menstruation then their waiting period is three months, as well as those who do not menstruate. And those who carry (and are pregnant), their appointed time is until they deliver their load (and give birth). And anyone who is cautious of God, He makes his affair easy for him
This is God's command which He sent it down to you. And anyone who is cautious of God, He removes his sins from him and He makes his reward great

Let them live where you live, according to your means, and do not harm them in order to pressure them (to leave), and if they are carrying then spend on them until they deliver their load (and give birth). And if they nurse (your child) for you, then give them their wages and consult between yourselves nicely, and if you find it difficult then another (woman) may nurse (the child) for him

A wealthy man should spend according to his wealth and anyone whose provisions are restricted for him then he should spend according to what God gave him. God does not task anyone except according to what He gave it. God in going to brings about ease after difficulty
And how many a town defied its Master's commandment and His messengers, then We called them into account, a severe accounting, and We punished them, an awful punishment
So it tasted the bad result of its affair and the end of its affair was loss
God prepared a severe punishment for them. So, you people of understanding (reasonable people) who believed, be cautious of God. God has sent down a reminder to you

A messenger who reads God's clear signs to you in order to bring out those who believed and did good works from the darkness into the light. And anyone who believes and does good works, He admits him to gardens which rivers flow through them, remaining in there forever and ever. God has made good provision for him

God is the One who created seven skies, and like them of the earth, the command comes down between them so that you know that God is capable of everything and that God's knowledge surrounds everything
Prophet, why do you prohibit what God made lawful for you, looking for your wives' pleasure? God is forgiving and merciful
God has mandated for you breakup of your oaths (when they are in conflict with God's commandments). God is your protector, and He is the knowledgeable, the wise

And when the prophet confidentially told a saying to one of his wives, then when she told (the other) about it, God informed him of it, making known some of it and avoided some. So when he told her about it, she said: who told you about this? He said: the knowledgeable, the well informed told me

So if you two repent to God, then your hearts have inclined (to God's command), and if you back each other up against him, then God is indeed his protector as well as Gabriel and the righteous believers, furthermore the angels are (also his) supporter
If he divorces you, perhaps His Master gives him better wives than you in exchange, submitted, believer, obedient, repentant, devoted servants, fasting, previously married and virgin women

You who believe, protect yourselves and your families from a fire that its fuel is people and stones, over which are angels harsh and severe who do not disobey God in what He orders them and they do what they are ordered
You who disbelieved, do not apologize today, you are only penalized for what you used to do

You who believe, repent to God a sincere repentance, perhaps your Master removes your sins from you and admits you to gardens which rivers flow through them on a day that God does not humiliate the prophet and those who believed with him. Their light rushing ahead of them and to the right of them, and they say: our Master complete our light for us and forgive us, You are capable of everything
Prophet, try hard against the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be firm against them. Their housing is hell, and it is a bad destination

God gave an example of those who disbelieved, wife of Noah and wife of Lot, they were under (marriage to) two servants from Our righteous servants, then they both betrayed them, so they were of no use to them against God whatsoever, and were told: enter the fire with those who enter

And God gave an example of those who believed, wife of Pharaoh, when she said: my Master, build me a house with you in the garden and save me from Pharaoh and his work and save me from the wrongdoing people
And Mary, daughter of Imran who guarded her private part, then We blew from Our breath/spirit into it and she confirmed her Master's words and His books, and she was of the obedient ones
Blessed is the One that the kingdom is in His hands, and He is capable of everything
The One who created the death and the life to test which one of you does better work. And He is the powerful, the forgiving
The One who created seven skies one above the other. You do not see any inconsistency in the creations of the beneficent. So return the eye (and look again), do you see any cracks
Then return the eye (and look again and) again, the eye returns to you ashamed and tired
And We have certainly beautified the world's sky with lamps (stars), and We made them meteorites for (throwing at) the devils, and We prepared the punishment of burning fire for them
And for those who disbelieved in their Master is punishment of hell, and it is a bad destination
When they are thrown in it, they hear an awful roar from it while it boils
It nearly blows up from the rage. Every time a bunch (of disbelievers) is thrown in it, its keepers ask them: did not a warner come to you
They say: yes, a warner has come to us, but we denied and we said: God did not send down anything, you are only in a great error
And they (also) say: if we had listened or had understood, we would not be among inhabitants of the burning fire
So they confess to their sin, and down with the inhabitants of the burning fire
Those who are afraid of their Master in secret, there is forgiveness and a great reward for them
Whether you hide your word or you disclose it, He knows what is inside the chests
Does He not know what He created? He is the nice, the well informed
He is the One who made the earth tame for you, so walk in its tracts and eat of His provision. The resurrection is to Him
Are you safe from the One in the sky that He does not make you sink in the earth when it suddenly shakes
Or are you safe from the One in the sky that He does not send a sandstorm upon you? Then you are going to know how My warning is
And those before them have certainly denied, so how was My rejection (and punishment)
Or did they not look at the birds above them spreading (their) wings and folding them? What holds them except the beneficent? He sees everything
Or who is this, the one who is an army for you helping you, other than the beneficent? The disbelievers are only in deception
Or who is this, the one who provides for you if He withholds His provision? No, but they insist on rebellion and hatred
Is someone who walks with his face downward better guided or someone who walks properly on a straight path
Say: He is the One who created you and made the hearing and the sight and the heart for you, but you thank a little
say: He is the One who scattered you on the earth, and you will be gathered to Him
And they say: when is this promise, if you are truthful
Say: the knowledge of it is only with God, and I am only to warn clearly
Then when they see it near, faces of those who disbelieved turns gloomy, and it is said: this is that which you used to called for
Say: what do you think if God destroys me and those with me or He has mercy on us, then who protects the disbelievers from a painful punishment
Say: He is the beneficent, we believed in Him and we trust in Him, and you are going to know who is in an obvious error
Say: what do you think if your water (sinks deep and) becomes dried up, then who brings you (fresh) running water
Nun (the letter N), by the pen and what they write
you are not a madman by your Master's grace
And indeed an unending reward is for you
And you are indeed of a great character (and morality)
So you are going to see and they will see
which of you is the crazy one
Indeed your Master knows best who is lost from His way, and He knows best who the guided ones are
So do not obey the deniers
They wish that you be flexible, then they would be flexible
So do not obey any insignificant oath taker
slandering, going around (spreading) malicious lies
preventing the good, exceeding the limits, sinful
ill-mannered (and despicable), and after all this mean (and notorious)
even if he is wealthy and has many children
When Our verses are read to him, he says: stories of the earlier ones
We are going to brand him on the nose
Indeed We test them as We tested the owners of the garden when they swore that they shall pick it in the morning
with no exceptions
Then a disaster, from your Master, came to it while they were sleep
so it became as like a totally picked field
Then they called one another in the morning
(saying): go to your crop early if you are pickers
so they went on, and they were talking softly (saying)
no poor shall enter it over you today
And they went out early determined and capable
Then when they saw it they said: we are lost
no, but we are deprived
The fairest of them said: did I not tell you, why do you not glorify (God)
They said: our Master is flawless, indeed we were wrongdoers
So they turned on each other blaming one another
They said: woe to us, indeed we were rebellious
Perhaps our Master gives us better than that in exchange, indeed we are fond of our Master
That is how the punishment is, and the punishment of the hereafter is certainly greater, if they knew
Indeed there are gardens of delight for those who control themselves with their Master
Should We place the submitted ones the same as the guilty ones
What is with you, how do you judge (like this)
Do you have a book that you study from it
and indeed whatever you choose is in it for you
Or do you have any vows (binding) on Us, reaching to the resurrection day, that whatever you judge is yours
Ask them which one of them guarantees this
Or do they have associates? Then let them bring their associates if they are truthful
On a day when leg is bared (and the deeds are exposed) and they are called to the prostration, but they cannot
Lowering their eyes, humiliation overcomes them, and they had been called to show humbleness while they were sound and healthy
So leave Me (alone) with anyone who denies this saying, We are going to gradually lure them to destruction from where they do not know
And I give them time, as My plan is solid
Or do you ask them for a wage, and they are weighed down by the debt
Or is the unseen with them, so they write it
